synopsis:
The first episode, Musha, Knight, Commando: SD Gundam Emergency Sortie, features the three Gundams and a young girl named Riplin joining together to fight evil.
The second episode, Dawn of Paparu, Episode 103: Suginamu's Bride, stars Artesia in a fantasy-themed adventure.

title.jp: Mobile Suit SD Gundam Musha, Knight, Commando
